## ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT SECURITY NOTICE

**For sensitive security vulnerabilities, please DO NOT create a public issue.**

Instead, please email us directly at: **security@pandas-tracker.com**

This ensures that security issues are handled privately and responsibly to protect all users.

## üîí Security Issue Type

**What type of security issue is this?**
- [ ] **Non-sensitive security improvement** (safe to discuss publicly)
- [ ] **Security configuration question** (general security practices)
- [ ] **Security documentation issue** (improvements to security docs)
- [ ] **Security feature request** (new security features)

**If this is a vulnerability that could be exploited, please email security@pandas-tracker.com instead.**

---

## üö® Responsible Disclosure

We are committed to responsible disclosure of security issues:

1. **Report privately** for sensitive vulnerabilities: security@pandas-tracker.com
2. **We will respond** within 24 hours to acknowledge receipt
3. **We will investigate** and provide updates on our progress
4. **We will fix** confirmed vulnerabilities as quickly as possible
5. **We will credit** researchers who responsibly disclose issues (with permission)

## üôè Thank You

Thank you for helping keep the PANDAS Autoimmune Tracker secure for all families. Your security awareness helps protect sensitive medical information and ensures families can trust our platform with their most important data.

**Remember:** The security of medical data is critical for families managing PANDAS/PANS conditions. Your vigilance helps protect children and families who depend on this platform for their healthcare management.
